name: Tales of Naturia Picnic Basket Demo
name_original: Tales of Naturia Picnic Basket Demo
description:
This is a short demo for a RPG Maker MZ project that's very early in development. This is just to test out the functionality of the game's cooking feature. This may be updated later to account for any fixes or additions for the sake of testing.

The game itself is a non-profit, non-commercial entity that uses assets from other works. All rights belong to their respective owners.
